ShortDescription.Value: Increases number of workers in City Services plus other small adjustments.

Publish.LongDescription:
**City Services Redux** aka RealCity
Tweak and modify City Service buildings to your liking. By default, you could just install this mod and use it as-is with no configuration.
### Quick-Start - Just Click "PRESETS" and play game, done. - Curated preset list that increases the **number of workers** in City Services and a few other small adjustments (details below). - Increased workers automatically increases the wages (scaled by the game itself). - New parameters are only applied to **new buildings**.
Number of preset configured buildings and extensions: **186**.
### 6 Languages * English, Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish * 简体中文 Simplified Chinese, Português Brazilian
### Curated Presets * All buildings have more workplaces, some have altered required education levels and other allowed tweaks. * Presets were designed with various considerations. Some have only slightly more workers (2), and some have many. * Examples: Central Intelligense vanilla is 200 workers, preset is 300 as this is a large building. * Crematorium has 2x higher processing rate to handle increased deaths from Population Rebalance (this won't matter if you use Magic Hearse). * Existing buildings need to be destroyed and plopped again to see changes for new values. * If you want more than preset numbers, then see Power users.
### Power Users - Easily tweak all player adjustable config file as you wish. - Open mod options, then "Open folder" button to create a config file you can customize. - Please refer to info / examples in Config.xml file for how to add / alter components (edit with Notepad++ or similar). - New changes can be applied even during the game (use options menu). - See Forum if interested in an Excel sheet helper that formats road cost/maintenance entries that can also be pasted into the config file.
### Technical
* DLC entries only work if you own the DLC and can plop the items. * Safety: mod does **not** modify save files or any game systems. * Can be removed at any time - already plopped buildings retain modded params and new buildings will have ofc vanilla params. * Performance: this is a lightweight configuration mod. It only does a short pass when applying settings (on game load or when you press APPLY). It does not add any per-frame systems, so it has essentially no impact on performance.
